name: Coffee Time (HumanBones)
description:
Unfinished game from a jam, Mini Game Jam, theme was Sleep. The idea behind the game was to get a cup of coffee so you don't fall asleep, and u get chased by ghosts. To get the coffee you need to assemble the coffee machine. Fighting ghost is only by turning the light on. I might get back to this project and finish it. All pixel art is drawn by me.

Controls:

W,A,S,D - moving,

E - action key
